#Text=Enhance Customer Support via Marketing Techniques
#Text=In the modern day business scenario , the sales and marketing departments are disintegrating and the entire sales procedure has changed .
#Text=Unlike what used to happen in the past , these two departments i.e. marketing & sales are now working together to boost up business revenue .

#Text=The sales representatives of your company today have just as much responsibility as your marketers since they not only have to entertain the customers ’ queries but also have to upsell and cross-sell , as a necessary part of their jobs .
#Text=Many tools are used by customer support and sales reps these days , which are made for personalizing the experience of your customers .
#Text=So , you should take time to look into the practices , which can help you enhance your customer support department .
#Text=Here are a few marketing techniques to help you out :
#Text=Steps
#Text=Use Marketing Automation .
#Text=You can make use of a tool like marketing automation , which can help you gather behavioral data from your prospective customers .
#Text=Doing this will help you creating a comprehensive file of your prospects .

#Text=With the help of marketing automation tool , you can enhance your sales intelligence , which will let you equip your customer support and sales agents to refine their communication with your customers , a communication which is purely focused on the customers ’ expectations and needs .
#Text=Tap into Social Data .

#Text=Apart from collecting behavioral data via tracking tools and marketing automation , you should also lookup social profiles of your prospective customers to find more business for your organization .
#Text=There are many profile lookup tools , which help you tap into social data .
#Text=You can conduct in-depth survey which may include a company ’s size , revenue and much more .
#Text=Tapping into social data helps you find a method to personalize the sales pitch and keep your sales process streamlined .
#Text=Respond instantaneously .
#Text=Unlike customers from the past , today ’s customers are more demanding , the reason being they have too many options to choose from .
#Text=If you are not efficient enough in providing them information regarding your products and/or services , they will never give you a second chance to market .

#Text=Earning customers ’ loyalty has become the most difficult task in the modern era for the entrepreneurs , since brand switching has become common due to countless competitors offering special rates and packages to their customers .
#Text=According to WebGreeter® , a leading online chat service provider , 30-50 percent of overall sales are a result of instantaneous response from the vendor .
#Text=Let Facebook help you .
#Text=You can enhance your customer support by asking help from Facebook .
#Text=You can create your company ’s page on Facebook and advertise about your products , services , promotions , special packages , discount offers and much more .
#Text=This will help your customers know closely about what you have to offer , and will make them trust you more .

#Text=The leading online chat service and software vendors such as WebGreeter® also offer integration of live chat with your Facebook page in order to entertain your online visitors and give them a purely personalized feeling .
